zh.CalendarRight.index.478322-0: 将左侧标签拖拽至右侧日历中，日历中的标签在场景联动中可以被引用作为执行动作的触发条件
zh.CalendarRight.index.478322-3: 开启后以周/月为最小单位制定日期模板，确认后可快速覆盖日历生效期
zh.CalendarRight.index.478322-6: 将模板快速作用于后续的

en.CalendarRight.index.478322-0: Drag the left label to the right calendar, and the labels in the calendar can be referenced as trigger conditions for executing actions in scene linkage
en.CalendarRight.index.478322-3: After activation, create a date template based on the minimum unit of week/month, which can quickly overwrite the effective period of the calendar after confirmation
en.CalendarRight.index.478322-6: Quickly apply the template to subsequent tasks within
